title: Seattle City Council 3/16/2020
description:
Due to the civil emergency on the coronavirus, councilmembers may be participating electronically. 

Agenda: Presentations; Payment of Bills; CB 119755: relating to employment in Seattle - paid sick and paid safe time; Res 31932: relating to City Light - energy conservation target; Res 31938: Emergency Order relating to residential evictions; Executive Session*.
(*Executive Sessions are closed to the public)

Advance to a specific part:
Presentation - Senior Deputy Mayor Mike Fong; Ben Noble, City Budget Office; Laurel Nelson, Emergency Management - 9:13
Minutes, Adoption of Introduction and Referral Calendar, Approval of the Agenda - 57:18
Payment of Bills - 1:05:43
CB 119755: relating to employment in Seattle - paid sick and paid safe time - 1:06:59
Res 31932: relating to City Light - energy conservation target - 1:27:40
Res 31938: Emergency Order relating to residential evictions - 1:29:40
Recess, Executive Session - 2:10:51
